attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned ask the above to reduce the excessive amounts sent to other countries in international world aid.  In the current economic situation this nation finds itself we believe that the PM's first duty should be to his own people who are suffering high taxes, low wages, food banks,  no street lights, flood damage and mass job losses instead of pursuing his own selfish ambitions of  being a world statesman at the expense of his own electorate!
